div.ab: For shards of a thorn or glass or an arrow/dart or another thing: Take skin(?) of a snake and heat it with olive oil, and put it on the place and (??)?)

Is it [a] carbuncle, then: Take three corns of pepper and a fig(?) and a little bit of ash from the fireplace and put them fully through each other [???] with the yolk from an egg and make a plaster from it and lay it on, and press it on(?) as long as until it dies.
Or, take a (???) candle of wax and drip it on, until it dies. This is also certain.
To write writing that resembles gold: Take light pigment, crushed,, and celandine juice, and mix it all together and write from it.
